alert.note: Alert for Harris; Meriwether; Talbot (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 1:57PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Meriwether, Talbot and northeastern Harris Counties through 230 PM EDT... At 157 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over F.d. Roosevelt State Park, or 7 miles northeast of Hamilton, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Hamilton, Talbotton, Manchester, Pine Mountain, Waverly Hall, Warm Springs, Woodland, Junction City, Pine Mountain-Callaway Gardens, Shiloh, F.d. Roosevelt State Park, Baldwinville, Flint Hill, Olive Branch, Po Biddy Crossroads, Pleasant Hill, Durand, Big Lazer Creek Wma, and Pine Mountain Valley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
